summary: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.
cast: Jennifer Garner|Goran Visnjic|Kirsten Zien|Will Yun Lee|Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa|Terence Stamp|Natassia Malthe|Bob Sapp|Chris Ackerman|Edson T. Ribeiro|Colin Cunningham|Hiro Kanagawa|Mark Houghton|Laura Ward|Kurt Max Runte|Nathaniel Arcand|Aaron Au|Kevan Ohtsji|Ian Tracey|Jana Mitsoula|Sean Akira|Taku Kawai|Kendall Cross|Ty Olsson|Nancy Wetzel|Paul Wu|Marke Driesschen|Billy Bryan|Jesse Cadotte|Jason Isaacs|Tom Woodruff Jr.
title: Elektra
